name: Microwave Tournament
description:
Microwave Tournament is a very high quality (sarcasm if anyone hasn't caught on) game made solo by me and my first in addition. It is inspired by the game Toasterball. I don't have a specific idea for the development of the game so if you want to help with that I would appreciate it.

I hope you enjoy the game and share it with your friends (if you have any) and remember you need another player to play.

If you find any bugs send me a screenshot with description it gonna really help with solving a problem.
